name: Spike Spire
description:
Lead Spike to the top of the spire while trying to allude enemies who want to send him back to the basement! 

I made this Roguelite Action Platformer in which the more damage you take the stronger your attack gets but the more health the weaker your attack is. I hope you like it and help the lil' dog escape this treacherous tower.

WASD & Arrow Keys to Aim and move left or right

N to Jump

M to attack

You can attack in multiple directions by holding the direction and attacking at the same time.

Music is was done by my awesome cousin Ben Sidwell (aka BUS)

Some sound effects from freesound.org
